name: Unicycle Takes Over!
description:
A game about a unicycle that had a dream that he could take over the world. If only... though the unicycle next door had the same idea. You must become the biggest unicycle in a combined dreamworld. Whoever was bigger would rule the world. 

Controls:

ControlPlayer 1Player 2Movement
ASWDNumPad: (1253)PedallingQ & ENumPad: (4 & 6)Rocket Boost (if equipped)FNumPad: 9

Audio assets are not mine as well as the game icon or font.
